# Large File Reader

```
$ javac LargeFileReader.java
```

```
$ java -Xmx64m LargeFileReader
HEAP At beginning : Total 16,252,928 bytes, Max 64,880,640 bytes, Free 15,800,312 bytes
```

```
$ du -h test.data.txt
1.1G    test.data.txt

$ head -n 1 test.data.txt
1 

$ tail -n 1 test.data.txt
1048576 
$
```
